name: spark-js-sdk-example
description: An example app for Cisco Spark's JavaScript SDK.
author: Asynchrony

scripts.start-dev: npm run build && watchify js/index.js -o js/bundle.js & watchify js/loginController -o js/loginBundle.js & node server.js
scripts.build: browserify js/index.js -o js/bundle.js & browserify js/loginController -o js/loginBundle.js
